name: Google Apps For Education
description:
• What we'll do
GDG Béja lance son Deuxième action : un atelier Google Apps For Education destinées aux étudiants d'ISLAIB et d'ISET le 28 Fév 2018 à 14h au sein de l'ISLAIB LAB1 animé par Mme Salwa Mekni...si vous êtes intéressées veuillez remplir ce formulaire..et bienvenu à vous! Qui Sommes nous :

Le Google Developer Group (GDG) Béja est le groupe de développeurs dédié aux technologies de Google dans la région de Béja.

L'objectif du groupe est d'organiser des événements réguliers pour échanger autour des technologies et outils de Google.

Android, Chrome, App Engine, AngularJS, Cardboard, Dart, Go, les API Maps, YouTube, Calendar ou tout autre technologie de Google vous intéresse ? Rejoignez le groupe pour participer à nos événements et échanger sur ces sujets.

• What to bring
laptop

• Important to know

name: Google Assistant
description:
• What we'll do
Actions on Google and Google Assistant are one of the major Google technical areas and we want to invite the whole developer community to learn about creating Actions for the Google Assistant.

**More Details will be updated soon...

“Build Actions for Your Community” is an open and modular event series designed by Google and offered to community organizers worldwide. You can offer opportunities to developers attending your events to learn how to build Actions for the Google Assistant that are useful for their community - whether it's a professional network, interest group, or your hometown. This way, they can build something in an area that they care about or are interested in.

• What to bring

• Important to know

name: Africa Code Week Beja: School Girls
description:
MentorNations, GDGBeja and Dynamic Network Club are excited to welcome School Girls living in Beja to participate in #eSkills4Girls Event and to develop their knowledge in Technology.
The #eSkills4Girls initiative aims at tackling the existing gender digital divide in particular in low income and developing countries. The goal is to globally increase the access of women and girls in the digital world and to boost relevant education and employment opportunities.
For more informations about the initiative:
https://www.eskills4girls.org/

name: Africa Code Week Beja: University Girls
description:
MentorNations, GDGBeja and Dynamic Network Club are excited to welcome University Girls living in Beja to participate in #eSkills4Girls Event and to develop their knowledge in Technology.
The #eSkills4Girls initiative aims at tackling the existing gender digital divide in particular in low income and developing countries. The goal is to globally increase the access of women and girls in the digital world and to boost relevant education and employment opportunities.
For more informations about the initiative:
https://www.eskills4girls.org/

name: Build Your First Android App in Java Workshop
description:
Build Your First Android App in Java
(Basic understanding of Variables and loops required)

Abstract:
In this workshop a practical introduction to Android App Development in Java.
Which will include:
How to use Android Studio to build your app.
How to run your app on a device or in the emulator.
How to add interactive buttons.
How to display a second screen.

All the above will be discussed with the focus on how you can get started with Android Development with a practical example.

Agenda:
Create your first project
Explore the layout editor
Explaining string and color resources
How to work with views and constraints
Make your app interactive
Exploring activities and how to work with them

Output:
- Basic and practical knowledge of Android App Development which will lay down the foundation for you to get started on developing Android Apps.

What to bring:
- Charged Laptop
- Install Android Studio https://developer.android.com/studio/install (You will need to install the Java Development Kit (JDK) in order to install it http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html

description:

name: DevFest Beja 2018
description:
GDG DevFest Beja 2018 is our annual all-day developer conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, codelabs, hackathon and more! GDG DevFest will, at its core, be powered by a shared belief that when developers come together to exchange ideas, amazing things can happen!

DevFest Beja 2018 is a full-day developer conference featuring awesome world-class speakers from technology leaders within the community as well as Google product team developers. This first Edition will be kind of special So stay tuned ...

name: Flutter Study Jams
description:
Work with Google instructors step-by-step to build a fully functional native “Unit Converter App” for both iOS and Android using Flutter
Learn how to set up your environment and start building your first Flutter application
Learn about fundamentals: UI Widgets, App State, Material Design, User Interaction and Gestures, and Packages
Learn how to structure and architect your app and use Flutter's tooling to build apps efficiently
Complete the course and get Google-offered Study Jam completion certificate and a profile badge.

name: Tunisian Freelancers Day (TFD)
description:
Fort du succès de la première édition de la journée "TunisianFreelancers Day" en 2016, l’institut supérieur des langues appliquées et d’informatique de Béja « ISLAIB » et l’association tunisienne des freelancers dans les domaines créatifs «Prod’it»ont le plaisir de vous inviter à la deuxième édition qui se tiendra à l’ISLAIB, le mercredi 23 Janvier 2019 de 9h à 16H30.

Voilà un formulaire pour ceux qui veulent s'inscrire en tant qu’organisateur:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeXMw_iMJY83GvoHgnup7H5VEThfuWOQB7YuAA7_aR0c2X8nw/viewform

et un autre formulaire pour ceux qui veulent y assister en tant que participant :
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdpJ9S9IrJ6rAEMGVGN3djAd77TNHtqa4nR7nVpxb6qORJ86g/viewform

Voilà le lien facebook de l'événement:
https://www.facebook.com/events/378360702738469/

page de l'association tunisienne des freelancers "Prodit"
https://www.facebook.com/uprodit/

Dans la continuité de la première édition, la deuxième édition du «Tunisian Freelancer Day» portera sur le thème de l’organisation et le développement des freelancers qui restent parmi les défis majeurs à relever pour améliorer à la fois la productivité et la qualité de vie des freelancers au travail, avec la thématique:
« Le travail en freelance dans les métiers créatifs: de la précarité à l’opportunité ».

name: Flutter Study Jams 2019
description:
Work with Google instructors step-by-step to build a fully functional native “Unit Converter App” for both iOS and Android using Flutter
Learn how to set up your environment and start building your first Flutter application

Learn how to structure and architect your app and use Flutter's tooling to build apps efficiently

name: Google Hash Code 2019
description:
Hashcode - GDG Beja

GDG Beja is proud to organize for the first time, the GDG Beja Hash-code.

** Stay tuned for more information. **

# Hashcode

Meanwhile check the Hashcode website for registration and more information.

https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode

> Past problem statements
https://codingcompetitions.withgoogle.com/hashcode/archive

>Three reasons to participate in Hashcode
https://www.blog.google/technology/developers/three-reasons-to-participate-in-hashcode/

# From the website
What’s involved?
"Hash Code is a team programming competition, organized by Google, for students and professionals around the world. You pick your team and programming language and we pick an engineering problem for you to solve. This year’s contest kicks off with an Online Qualification Round, where your team can compete from wherever you’d like, including from one of our Hash Code hubs. Top teams will then be invited to a Google office for the Final Round."

name: Cloud StudyJams 2019
description:
Study Jams are back! Join us on the 3rd of March for our Google Cloud Study Jam where we'll be taking on:
-Learning how to set up development and production environments in the Cloud.
And at the end of the day you will:
-Get access to Qwiklabs, a Google training tool, free of charge (a $70+ value).
-Get Google-hosted badges for your online profile, to show potential employers what you know about Cloud computing.

• What to bring
Notebook, Laptop, An open mind.

• Important to know
Please feel free to contact us in case of any questions.

name: Modélisation du comportement Humain.
description:
Oyem Tunisie organise une formation sur la modélisation du comportement humain pour atteindre l’excellence.

La détection et la mesure des éléments du comportement humain afin d'en réaliser un modèle à suivre pour allez au delà de ses objectifs.

Suite à cette formation vous allez apprendre à modéliser votre mentor/votre idole, pour accélérer votre succès.

Décortique le comportement humain ainsi que les rouages de son esprit pour arriver a créé un modèle à suivre. Déterminer les conditions de succès et de les reproduire au mieux.

Moyens Pédagogiques :

Des apports théoriques appuyés par des études de cas, jeux de rôles, mise en situation, explications imagées

Des exercices progressifs

Contenu :

01 : Définition de l’être humain

02 : La mesure de la réussite

03 : Détection des failles internes

04 : Observation de la structure mentale

05 : Mimétisme comportemental

06 : Carte du monde (PNL).

07 : Etapes de la modélisation (PNL).

08 : Analyse et application.
